kubeInstanceInfoList.yamlContent:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: smarta-ss-community-svc
  namespace: itsma1
  labels:
    itsmaService: itom-smartanalytics
    app: smarta-ss-community-svc
spec:
  ports:
  - name: community
    port: 9030
    targetPort: 9030
  - name: svcport
    port: 9031
    targetPort: 9031
  selector:
    app: smarta-ss-community

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: smarta-ss-community
  namespace: itsma1
  labels:
    itsmaService: itom-smartanalytics
    app: smarta-ss-community
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels: 
      app: smarta-ss-community
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        itsmaService: itom-smartanalytics
        app: smarta-ss-community
    spec:
      nodeSelector:
        Worker: label
      containers:
      - name: smarta-ss-community
        image: shc-harbor-dev.hpeswlab.net/itsma/itom-itsma-idol-community:1.0.0-20170906-b1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9030
        - containerPort: 9031
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /?action=getstatus
            port: 9031
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 6
          periodSeconds: 30
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /?action=getstatus
            port: 9031
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 2
          periodSeconds: 30
        volumeMounts:
        - name: idoldata
          mountPath: "/var/community/log/"
          subPath: "logs/idol/ss/community/"
        - name: idoldata
          mountPath: "/opt/community/modules/"
          subPath: "data/idol/modules/"
        - name: idoldata
          mountPath: "/opt/community/users/"
          subPath: "data/idol/ss/community/users/"
        - name: idoldata 
          mountPath: "/opt/community/community.cfg"
          subPath: "config/idol/ss/community/community.cfg"
        - name: idoldata
          mountPath: "/opt/community/licensekey.dat"
          subPath: "license/idol/licensekey.dat"
        - name: idoldata
          mountPath: "/opt/synonym.txt"
          subPath: "config/idol/synonym/synonym.txt"
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "/opt/scripts/Stopcommunity.sh"]
      volumes:
      - name: idoldata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smartanalytics-volume
      imagePullSecrets:
        - name: registrypullsecret
